title: Author Freudenheim on Book: 'The Brooklyn Experience' (Audio)
itunes:title: Author Freudenheim on Book: 'The Brooklyn Experience' (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Ellen Freudenheim, author of her fourth guidebook, “The Brooklyn Experience,” on the explosion of business, culture and development in Brooklyn.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
